search.query: |tstats count where index=* sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" create data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type IN($resource_type_tok$)

|tstats count where index=* sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" delete data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type IN($resource_type_tok$)

|makeresults |addinfo |eval secs=(info_max_time-info_min_time) |eval slotcount=100 |eval rounder=3 |eval easy=floor(secs/slotcount) |eval num_field = tostring(easy) |eval divider=pow(10,len(num_field)-1) |eval divider=if(easy<10, 10, pow(10,len(num_field)-1)) |eval spn=round(easy/divider,0)*divider |eval spn=if(spn=0,1,spn) |eval spn=printf("%*d", 0, spn) |eval infinity=if(info_max_time="+Infinity","auto",0) |eval spn=if(infinity=0,spn,infinity) |eval spn2=if(spn="auto","","span="+spn)
|tstats count where index=* sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message by data.resource.labels.project_id| fields data.resource.labels.project_id | rename data.resource.labels.project_id as Project_ID

|tstats dc(data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type) where index=* sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) by data.resource.labels.project_id, "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type"| rename "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type" as resourceType|dedup resourceType

|tstats count where index=* sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) $create_del_tok$ AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type IN($resource_type_tok$) by _time, "data.protoPayload.methodName" span=$spanning_tok$ | timechart $spanning_tok2$ sum(count) by data.protoPayload.methodName

index=* sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type IN($resource_type_tok$) | eval name1='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(isnull(name1), name2,name1) | rename "data.protoPayload.methodName" as Method, "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type" as "Resource Type", data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, "data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.requestAttributes.time" as Time, "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as Email, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP" | table Method, "Resource Type",Permission, Name, Time, Email, "Caller IP"

index=* sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="*.cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" delete data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type IN($resource_type_tok$) | eval name1='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(isnull(name1), name2,name1) | table "data.protoPayload.methodName", "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type",data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission, Name, "data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.requestAttributes.time", data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp | rename "data.protoPayload.methodName" as Method, "data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type" as "Resource Type", data.protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, "data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.requestAttributes.time" as Time, "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as Email, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP"
